DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Deviation Performed Observation Outcome Subcategory Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying a subdivision within a larger category of a protocol deviation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Deviation Performed Observation Outcome Subcategory Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An unintended departure from the study plan which has not been prospectively reviewed and approved by the IRB and FDA.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unintended departure from the study plan which has not been prospectively reviewed and approved by the IRB and FDA.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Reference concept defined by a referenced code system.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
